postlist.title: 這次演算法考試的範圍
postlist.slug: 這次演算法考試的範圍
postlist.path: api/articles/這次演算法考試的範圍.json
postlist.content:
鑑於上次的考試考得有點爛,我決定要把這次的考試範圍稍微處理一下

這次演算法課的範圍如下：

  1. Binary Tree
    • Splay Tree
    • B Tree
    • Red Black Tree
  2. Dynamic Programming
    • LCS
    • Knapsack problems
    • LIS
  3. Dynamic Programming
    • Maximum subarray
    • Chained matrix multiplication
    • Optimal binary search tree (OBST)
    • Maximum subarray
    • Coin exchanging

————–(6/4 目前為止至上到這裡)————-

  1. Greedy Method
    • Sprinklers
  2. Graph Algorithm
    • BFS
    • DFS
    • Directed Acyclic Graphs
postlist.text: 鑑於上次的考試考得有點爛,我決定要把這次的考試範圍稍微處理一下這次演算法課的範圍如下：Binary TreeSplay TreeB TreeRed Black TreeDynamic ProgrammingLCSKnapsack problemsLISDynamic Progra
